title: WTB/WTT -- Tinker, Bat off: AB, EPDG, OM, Fact 42
author: Rhotchkiss

posts.post_title: WTB/WTT -- Tinker, Bat off: AB, EPDG, OM, Fact 42
posts.post_content: Will pay well -- these are the only backs I need to complete my Tinker, Bat Off, back run.  Please PM or email -- [url]rhotchkiss@horizonlandco.com[/url] -- if you have a Tinker Bat off in American Beauty, Old Mill, EPDG, or Piedmont 350-460, Fact 42.

Don't have any extras, sorry. Are you aware that there's a Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 30? It's a "No Print" hand cut from a sheet before the overprint was added. One is listed in the PSA population report for T206's all the way at the bottom. I own a raw one and only those two were ever offered into the market about 15 months ago. If I had an extra, I'd sell you one but I don't want to break up my set of 27. Good luck on your quest.

I may have the old mill.  Need to check if it's tinker or chance. Zach


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
